title: "A Real Challenger" Worlds Mission
body: The mission says to complete 4 worlds missions. I have 1/4 complete even though I have done all the missions available for me. Is this correct or should there be more? (I'm a free player)

replies.body: Sometimes those missions are a little delayed in updating their progress correctly, but I was able to confirm that you had enough World's missions complete. Give it a little time and make sure to refresh your client, but let me know if it still doesn't complete for you today.

A Real Challenger
Complete 4 more Worlds Missions
 I have 1/4 complete ....  i  done all  missions   like couple days  agoe

I have the same problem. last available mission done was like thursday last week. 
Only mission left is 'a real challenger' in which it states I have 1/4 completed. 

No changes since then. 
How can I fix this?

Same issue here i can screen or w/e, how can i contact someone to fix it 


ps: i completed all others challenge a week ago
I have the same problem, I've done all the missions available, that one appeared alone once i finished the others, but no other missions available. I Also updated the client but nothing, I am stuck

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=70ErIj7U,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-09-25T20:37:17.934+0000)
>
> Sometimes those missions are a little delayed in updating their progress correctly, but I was able to confirm that you had enough World's missions complete. Give it a little time and make sure to refresh your client, but let me know if it still doesn't complete for you today.

Thanks it worked! :D
I've been stuck on 1/4 for several days and have won at least six games with the proper icon displayed. No change.
Yeah I got that too and I have no more missions to do. What should I do right now?

I'm in the same situation with 1/4 completion of "A Real Challenger". I knew from reading the official page that they were weekly missions, but its Tuesday now and still no new missions, so exactly when is it considered 'the next week'. it would be nice to know approximately which day of each week we can expect to be given new missions.
Yea.. IDK when the new missions is coming.... {{champion:122}}
New missions are added every week
